public void setHostname(String hostname)
Hostname of a remote server. Leave this on a null value, if you do not need a remote connection.

SSH port of a remote server. Leave this on a null value, if you do not need a remote connection.

Username for SSH connection Leave this on a null value, if you do not need a remote connection.

getKeyFilePath

public String getKeyFilePath()

setKeyFilePath

public void setKeyFilePath(String keyFilePath)
Keyfile for SSH key-based auth. Leave this on a null value, if you do not need a remote connection.

getPassword

public String getPassword()

setPassword

public void setPassword(String password)
Password for SSH auth. Please note, that this is a non-encrypted storage! If you set a keyFilePath the password will be erased. The keyfile is always the preferred kind of authentication!
